title: Werehouse

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: On full moons, you may choose to attack a player. Any players who visit that player will be invited into your house, and will only be able to use their abilities on nights with full moons. They will also receive astral Basic protection from you as long as you live. You will learn the names of all players invited into your house.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Either kill or invite into your house all players.

desc:
Post 5273
*the full moon will NEVER change me into a house I- ding dong. ding dong ding dong ding dong.*
